1.content:
"Well that was stupid" Lauren said changing the channel from a lame movie she had been spending the last couple hours watching. Sitting around bored on a Saturday morning into the afternoon Lauren was just lounging around when her phone rang.

"Hey Laur it's Shannon, whats up girl?" Lauren recognized the voice of her best friend on the other line.

"Hey Shan, geez it's been like forever since I've seen you" Lauren smiles having been so busy with work that she didn't have much time for social activities and not seeing her friend in ages.

"Yeah I know Ms. Busybody, but I was actually calling because I'm in a bit of a predicament. I mean I know you have been really busy lately so you probably would not have much time but we need another player for my recreation leauge..." she starts to say as Lauren is too happy and excited to let her finish.

"I'm definitely in Shan, I know I've been kinda busy but I actually am all caught up and was seriously just sitting on my ass bored out of my mind. You tell me when and where and I'll be there." Lauren says standing up and grabbing her purse looking at her outfit of a tank-top and yoga pants thinking they will work no matter what.

Lauren could hear Shannon's glee on the opposite end of the phone. "Oh that is soooo awesome La, well the game is an hour over at the park, I'll see you there?"

Lauren was about to walk out the door when she hesitated. "Hehehe, oh duh Shan, I probably should ask...what are you playing?"

So what are they playing?

111.content:
Lauren's team mates cheered loudly as the scoreboard showed they had managed to win by a single point. Some jumped up and down and excitement, while others hugged each other, and one girl even did cartwheels. Lauren had never before seen a team so happy to have won a game, and she was amazed by how seriously everyone seemed to be taking it.

Her opponents on the other hand seemed devastated at the lose. Some of them turned pale, and many even broke down and began crying. "Uh, what's the matter with you guys?" asked Lauren to her rival team. "Its only a game!"

"Only a game?!" sniffled one of the girls between tears. "That's easy for you to say! I lost my twin sister to your friend there," she said, pointing to Shannon. "This game meant everything to me, because it was the my only hope of saving her from... that bitch." The girl then broke down and began sobbing once again.

"Eh, Shannon? What the hell is she talking about?" asked Lauren, completely puzzled.

"Umm...." stammered Shannon, biting her lower lip. "Well, if you had actually read the disclaimer before you signed it, you would have known..."

"Known what?" asked Lauren with her hands on her hips.

"Known that one of the members of the losing team ends up shrunk down and becomes the property of a member of the winning team. We have been doing this for quite some time now, and I'm proud to say I've earned a couple trophies." Shannon grinned.

Lauren's eyes went wide. "You mean that girl's twin sister? You shrunk her and now you own her??"

"Lock, stock and barrel!" exclaimed Shannon. "Our team is pretty good. Most of us have at least one trophy by now, and some even have two. We haven't lost a game yet, although this one did end up being pretty close."

"Oh my!" exclaimed Lauren. "Had I known this I would have tried even harder to win. But what about this girl's sister? What did you do with her?"

Shannon didn't say a word, but gave a smile and a wink and pointed towards...

She looked around and realised where she was, her face lit up for a moment and she turned to her sister.

"Amanda!" She squealed and jumped to her feet. "You've saved me!" She said with her hands in the air.

"I-I'm sorry, Melissa." The twin, apparently named Amanda said and then looked away in shame.

"Sorry, Mel. I was just using you for a quick demo for Lauren here. Lauren, this is Mel. I won her just last week. Say "Hi", Mel." Shannon said as she held her hand up to Lauren.

The smelly girl just sat, unblinking on Shannon's palm. The brief glimmer of hope that she felt having been torn away.

"Say it, or I'm putting you back in my ass right now." Shannon said, pointedly.

Melissa's expression turned to anger for a moment and then to resignation. "Hi..." She sighed.

"Hey! Lauren here is your superior. Greet her properly." Shannon said, this time with a smile and then a wink at Lauren. Lauren was still struggling to to take all this in.

Melissa stood up shakily on Shannon's palm.

"Great! Good job, Mel." Shannon said with a smile as Melissa turned to face her with an expectant look. "Welp, back in you go."

"I should've just let you knock me on my ass." Shannon said casually. "You would've crushed your own sister, idiot."

Amanda looked terrified of the gun in Shannon's hand, she backed back up to her team for a bit of solidarity.

"As much as I would love to shrink you and have a matching set, Amanda." Shannon said, pointing the gun towards the quivering redhead. "Lauren here won the game for us, plus she's a newbie. So I'll give her first dibs."

"Hell yeah! Hand it over." Lauren said and Shannon passed her the gun, she surveyed the six girls that made up the opposing team. "But who should I pick?"

Lauren looked to Shannon for help.

"Oh, how rude of me. I haven't introduced you all yet. Lauren, these girls are what's left of the Falcons. They've been on a bit of a losing streak lately and have lost most of their best players. See for some of the girls here, it's not about picking the girl that makes the best trophy, they pick strategically to weaken the team. If a team loses too many players and can't play, then they all get eliminated." Shannon said, with a wink indicating that she was one such girl.

"So, what happens when a whole team gets eliminated?" Lauren asked, interested in the system that these psycho fetishists had devised.

"If a team loses too many members then the whole team gets shrunk and then auctioned off at the end of the day." Said a tall blonde woman on the other team.

"Yeah..." Shannon said. "Did I mention how grateful I am that you showed up today yet?"

"Oh..." Lauren said, eyes wide with realisation. "So, do you have any idea who I should pick?"

"Well, you already know Amanda. I won her sister last week and unlike her tough as nails sister, she's a shy and demure little girl. She's 22 and 5'8" (for now) and her fiery red hair is just gorgeous. I miss when Melissa's hair had that luster. She's come into her own a bit since last week, but I don't think that it'd take a whole lot to break her in if you're looking for a servant type. Plus we could schedule play dates with her sister, that'd be sooo cute."

"The talkative blonde, green eyed bombshell is Lucy, she's 6'1" with big ol' boobs, from California and she's the 26 year old captain of their team. She's survived being shrunk once before actually..." Shannon said with her arms crossed.

"Wow, what happened?" Lauren asked. She had figured that could happen, since Amanda had been talking about getting her sister back.

"Her team lost and she got chosen by one of the other girls... I think it was someone on the Dolphins... Lucy withstood a month of ownership before her team managed to win her back."

"What about the girl who shrank you?" Lauren asked.

Lucy took the jeweled chain from around her own neck and pulled out the pendant that had been hidden in her cleavage, at least Lauren had thought it was a pendant. At the end of the chain dangled a tiny woman, bound by her ankles.

"I got my own back, Cassie here knows that. Keep that in mind before you pick me." Lucy said with cold determination.

"She'll resist you for sure, but that'd make it all the more satisfying in the end if you ask me." Shannon said with a nod.

"Woah..." Lauren gasped, locking eyes with the next girl in line. She found herself looking way up.

"Yep, this one'd be fun just for the novelty. Helena here is a bodybuilder standing 6'7" with biceps the size of watermelons. Well, that's an exaggeration, but she can crush a watermelon with her thighs. The running joke has been the no one picks her to shrink because she'd still be able to overpower them." Shannon said with a laugh.

"Joke?" Helena scoffed and looked both Lauren and Shannon up and down. "It's a fact."

"She'd be a lot of fun, but I wouldn't risk putting her anywhere sensitive if I were you." Shannon said, with a tone of warning.

Lauren looked at these three women, all of them were burning with confidence but behind it Lauren could see anxiety. Lauren shifted her gaze to the remaining three girls.

"Who else have we got?" Lauren asked.

"Moving on, this chubby girl here is Megan. She last weighed in at 315lbs, which is just outside our usual weight limit but they stretched the rules for her because the Falcons needed a sixth member. Part of me thinks she wants to get shrunk, it's one way to lose weight. Or maybe she just wants to live in a world of giant food!" Shannon said with a giggle.

"Th-that's not true! Please, I don't want to be shrunken." Megan said, getting down on her knees and begging.

"Ugh, pathetic. Good look getting her to do anything."

Lauren found it hard not give Shannon a quip about a pot calling a kettle black in light of her own weight gain, but she decided to let it go.

"The wallflower back there, trying to hide behind Helena is Park. The Falcons' Asian Sensation. She's quiet, adorable and so shy. I'd love to get my hands on her, she'd probably die from blushing too hard. She's already pretty tiny at 5'1" too, so she wouldn't have to make much of an adjustment." Shannon said.

Park stepped out from behind Helena, but still seemed to be trying to disappear. The poor girl was visibly trembling.

"Are you going to pick someone or not!?" Shouted the last in line, a Latino woman.

"Relax, Rosie. We're almost done, then Lauren will take her pick. Lauren, this is Rose, she's 5'5" and a bit of a nervous wreck. She's always so fidgety during these selections that it puts people off of picking her."

Lauren took a close look at Rose. There was something about her fidgeting that was unusual and... Was that a blush on her face?

"Anyway, those are the Falcons. They're all good picks, really. Terrible volleyball players, but great tiny slaves."

Lauren gave each girl another glance over.
